meanings.definition: A list of songs or videos arranged in a particular order for playback.
meanings.sent1: I made a playlist of my favorite songs for the road trip.
meanings.sent2: She listens to her playlist every night before bed.
meanings.sent3: The party playlist was so good that everyone danced all night.
meanings.sent4: Her playlist was like a treasure chest of musical gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The playlist was like a magic spell that transported me to different emotions with each song.

meanings.definition: To create or organize a list of songs or videos for playback.
meanings.sent1: I will playlist the songs for the party tonight.
meanings.sent2: He playlists his favorite videos to watch during the weekend.
meanings.sent3: She playlisted the songs in such a way that it felt like a musical journey.
meanings.sent4: Playlist your day with uplifting tunes to keep you motivated.
meanings.sent5: Playlisting the songs was like painting a picture with different musical colors.
